title: Companions
content: Companions in Baldur's Gate 3 are characters that can be recruited to join the player's party and fight alongside them in combat. Each companion have different traits, equipment, lore, skills, and more â€” making them unique from one another. Throughout the game, players will meet NPCs that can be recruited as companions once certain conditions have been met. This page covers a list of all the Companions found in Baldur's Gate 3.
